title: Create daily routine tracking app with AI assistant

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store daily routines with fields for routine name, description, scheduled time, completion status, and timestamp

quotes: Create a app to track my daily routine

acceptanceCriteria: Backend can create new routine entries
Backend can retrieve all routines for a user
Backend can update routine completion status
Backend can delete routines

requirements.text: Implement frontend UI to display a list of daily routines showing name, scheduled time, and completion status with the ability to mark routines as complete
acceptanceCriteria: Users can view their list of daily routines
Users can check off completed routines
Completed routines are visually distinguished from incomplete ones
Routines are sorted by scheduled time

requirements.text: Create a form interface to add new routines with fields for routine name, description, and scheduled time
acceptanceCriteria: Users can input routine name, description, and time
Form validates required fields before submission
Successfully added routines appear in the routine list
Form clears after successful submission

requirements.text: Implement an AI assistant chat interface where users can interact with an assistant to get help managing their routines
acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface displays conversation history
Users can type and send messages to the assistant
Assistant responses are displayed in the chat
Chat is accessible from the main routine tracking view

requirements.text: Create backend logic for the AI assistant to provide intelligent suggestions and reminders about daily routines based on user's routine data
acceptanceCriteria: Assistant can analyze user's routine patterns
Assistant can suggest optimal times for routines
Assistant can remind users about incomplete routines
Assistant responses are contextual to the user's routine data

requirements.text: Add ability to edit existing routines including name, description, and scheduled time
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select a routine to edit
Edit form pre-fills with existing routine data
Changes are saved to backend
Updated routine reflects changes in the list

requirements.text: Implement a dashboard view showing daily progress statistics such as completion rate and streak tracking
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays total routines for the day
Dashboard shows completion percentage
Dashboard tracks consecutive days of completion
Statistics update in real-time as routines are completed

requirements.text: Create a modern, cohesive visual design with a calm and productive aesthetic using warm earth tones and clean typography that promotes focus and routine building
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses a consistent color palette throughout the app
Typography is clear and readable
Layout promotes ease of use and reduces cognitive load
Visual hierarchy guides users through their routine management tasks

constraints: Backend must use single-actor Motoko architecture
Frontend must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks and UI components
nonGoals: Integration with third-party AI services like OpenAI or Anthropic

required: Minimalist illustration of a morning routine checklist with warm earth tones (routine-hero.dim_1200x600.png)
Simple AI assistant avatar icon with friendly appearance (assistant-avatar.dim_128x128.png)
